name: Dicipher The Luck
description:
In this Top-Down shooter that was made in 50 hours, you play as a dice, the last of your kind and need to prevent the extinction of your race by defeating as many aliens as possible. On a countdown, or if there are no enemies, a dice will role and decide the next wave you will have to face. You can pick up a powerful power up called the Neutron Star and gain a special abillity...

(Pun in the title intended)
